description:
Now, you can customize all playable characters with the Mouse Ears & Tail Set! 

Note: Players can access the Mouse Ears & Tail Set by going to the Menu and scrolling to the Equipment section. The Mouse Ears & Tail Set is purely cosmetic and is visible during battle, cut scenes, and exploration segments with Neptune. Mix-n-match with the Swimsuit Set or the Sentai Set for fun!
name: Mouse Ears & Tail Set
